summary: Makes Khayla (Caravan Guard) a possible Follower and Spouse.
descriptionHtml:
MADE WITH FORETRENTY\'S AWESOME SKYRIM NPC EDITOR

Description: 
Makes Khayla (Khajiit caravan guard) a possible follower and spouse. 

WARNING: In order to make a female khajiit a possible follower, I had to give her a human voice. I did this for my own use, and I\'m happy with it. If you don\'t want your khajiit sound like a human, don\'t download it. 

I made her a Ranger and gave her a set of scaled armor.
Standard version:
She wears a hunter outfit as standard, so you still can give her any armor you like.
Nude version:
Khayla wearing no standard outfit, so you can give her any clothing you like. Or none at all.

EDIT: Added some batchfiles to the file section. One, to remove the hunting bow, when she ignores the better bows you gave her. And two to set her level to 20 and 30. (she won\'t auto-level higher than level 10). 
You can use those batchfiles with any follower you want.

If you want to change anything, feel free. All you need is this:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554

Install:
Copy CAT.bat and khayla.esp OR khayla_nude.esp in your data-folder

Uninstall:
Delete khayla.esp

Ingame:
Open console (~) and type \"bat cat\" (without quotes)

Known Bugs:
Some people (including me) ran into problems, when editing Khayla\'s appearance with the NPC Editor. The head mesh seems to crash the game. So if you edit Khayla, you might wanna go with her vanilla appearance and just copy the ESP file into you Skyrim folder.

When starting the battles for Whiterun, Windhelm and Solitude she simply dissappears, and will show up home again. I think that\'s because she is member of the caravan factions. And those get removed, when the battles start. Best send her home before starting the battles.
author: thypride
